author: guybedford
message:
lib,doc: revert format name to cjs over commonjs

PR-URL: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/18596
Reviewed-By: MichaÃ«l Zasso <targos@protonmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Colin Ihrig <cjihrig@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: James M Snell <jasnell@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Tiancheng "Timothy" Gu <timothygu99@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Myles Borins <myles.borins@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Ruben Bridgewater <ruben@bridgewater.de>

files.patch:
@@ -137,7 +137,7 @@ module. This can be one of the following:
 | `format` | Description |
 | --- | --- |
 | `"esm"` | Load a standard JavaScript module |
-| `"commonjs"` | Load a node-style CommonJS module |
+| `"cjs"` | Load a node-style CommonJS module |
 | `"builtin"` | Load a node builtin CommonJS module |
 | `"json"` | Load a JSON file |
 | `"addon"` | Load a [C++ Addon][addons] |
